mapper.update:
update cooperation_company
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
biz_introduce = #{bizIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cooperation_company set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_introduce = #{bizIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from cooperation_company
and `name` like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and `address` like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
and `contact_phone` like concat('%', #{contactPhone}, '%')
